Description: Handmade sub-cylindrical clay net-sinker, slightly squashed at one end, regular perforation pierced through its long side, edge of perforation is irregular, smooth surface, lightly burnt or sun baked, colour light grey.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2Y, B, level 3
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
